title: Ariel Shamai Released
body: Ariel Shamai, a talmid of Yeshivas Ateres Shlomo, was released from Military Prison 10 in Beit Lid, five days early. His release coincided with the levayah of Rebbetzin Leah Feiga Sorotzkin, mother of his rosh yeshivah, Rav Shalom Ber Sorotzkin.

title: Swastikas Deface Brooklyn School
body: Vandals spray-painted red swastikas on the front walls of Magen David Yeshivah and the neighboring Torah Center in Brooklyn overnight, sparking outrage in the community following the election of Muslim socialist Zohran Mamdani.
